issue.title: [CF 470] Option to invert meta-icon
issue.body:
Please consider adding an option for meta-icon to invert its state (show when it should be hidden and hide when it should be visible).

For example, I need to show meta-icon only when none of the two other icons are visible.

Example as a hunter: show Cobra shot icon when BOTH Explosive shot and Black arrow are NOT available.

If I add a meta-icon for both Cobra shot and Black arrow then this icon is shown when either or both of the ablilities are available. The opposite is needed - show when neither of the abilities are available.

This is also useful for frost mage rotation and maybe other specs and classes as well.

Thank you.


> Posted by CurseForge user algus2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #470 | Raw

comments.body:
You can use Icon Shown conditions (or other conditions, actually) to accomplish this quite easily. Create an icon for Cobra Shot, and add either 2 "Spell cooldown" conditions to check if BA and ES are on cooldown, or add 2 "Icon Shown" conditions to check if icons for ES and BA are shown or not.

Edited Mar 17, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
